message:
Sex traffickers often recruit children because not only are children more unsuspecting and vulnerable than adults, but there is also a high market demand for young victims. 

Fact #6 Traffickers target victims on the telephone, on the Internet, through friends, at the mall, and in after-school programs.
#BeSmart #BeSafe #Awareness=#Prevention

data.title: 30 Facts about Human Trafficking
